	[232] main ''
		[235] heading 'Creating merge requests (FREE)'
			[237] strong ''
				StaticText '(FREE)'
		[238] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'There are many different ways to create a merge request.'
		[239] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'NOTE: Use'
			[240] link 'branch naming patterns', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/repository/branches/index.md#naming'
			StaticText 'to streamline merge request creation.'
		[241] heading 'From the merge request list'
		[243] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can create a merge request from the list of merge requests.'
		[244] list ''
			[245] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[246] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
				StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[247] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left menu, select'
				[248] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText '.'
			[249] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'In the top right, select'
				[250] strong ''
					StaticText 'New merge request'
				StaticText '.'
			[251] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select a source and target branch and then'
				[252] strong ''
					StaticText 'Compare branches and continue'
				StaticText '.'
			[253] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Fill out the fields and select'
				[254] strong ''
					StaticText 'Create merge request'
				StaticText '.'
		[255] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'NOTE: Merge requests are designed around a one-to-one (1:1) branch relationship. Only one open merge request may be associated with a given target branch at a time.'
		[256] heading 'From an issue'
		[258] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can'
			[259] link 'create a merge request from an issue', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/repository/web_editor.md#create-a-new-branch-from-an-issue'
			StaticText '.'
		[260] heading 'When you add, edit, or upload a file'
		[262] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can create a merge request when you add, edit, or upload a file to a repository.'
		[263] list ''
			[264] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Add, edit, or upload a file to the repository.'

				ListMarker '0.'

			[267] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'

				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select the'
				[270] strong ''
					StaticText 'Start a new merge request with these changes'
				StaticText 'checkbox or toggle. This checkbox or toggle is visible only if the target is not the same as the source branch, or if the source branch is protected.'
			[271] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select'
				[272] strong ''
					StaticText 'Commit changes'
				StaticText '.'
		[273] heading 'When you create a branch'
		[275] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can create a merge request when you create a branch.'
		[276] list ''
			[277] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'

				[278] strong ''

			[279] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left menu, select'
				[280] strong ''

				StaticText '.'
			[281] listitem ''

				StaticText '.'
			[283] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Above the file list, on the right side, select'
				[284] strong ''
					StaticText 'Create merge request'
				StaticText '. A merge request is created. The default branch is the target.'
			[285] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Fill out the fields and select'
				[286] strong ''
					StaticText 'Create merge request'
				StaticText '.'
		[287] heading 'When you use Git commands locally'
		[289] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can create a merge request by running Git commands on your local machine.'
		[290] list ''
			[291] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[292] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Create a branch:'
				[295] code ''
					StaticText 'git checkout'
					StaticText '-b'
					StaticText 'my-new-branch'
				[298] button ''
					[299] image ''
			[300] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[301] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Create, edit, or delete files. The stage and commit them:'
				[304] code ''
					StaticText 'git add'
					StaticText '.'
					StaticText ''
					StaticText 'git commit'
					StaticText '-m'
					StaticText ''
					StaticText '"My commit message"'
				[310] button ''
					[311] image ''
			[312] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[313] paragraph ''
					[314] link 'Push your branch to GitLab', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/gitlab-basics/start-using-git.md#send-changes-to-gitlabcom'
					StaticText ':'
				[317] code ''
					StaticText 'git push origin my-new-branch'
				[319] button ''
					[320] image ''
				[321] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'GitLab prompts you with a direct link for creating a merge request:'
				[324] code ''
					StaticText '...'
					StaticText ''
					StaticText 'remote: To create a merge request for my-new-branch, visit:'
					StaticText ''
					StaticText 'remote:   https://gitlab.example.com/my-group/my-project/merge_requests/new?merge_request%5Bsource_branch%5D=my-new-branch'

					[329] image ''

				[331] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Copy the link and paste it in your browser.'
		[332] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can add other'
			[333] link 'flags to commands when pushing through the command line', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/push_options.md'
			StaticText 'to reduce the need for editing merge requests manually through the UI.'
		[334] heading 'When you work in a fork'
		[336] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can create a merge request from your fork to contribute back to the main project.'
		[337] list ''
			[338] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[339] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
				StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[340] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select your fork of the repository.'
			[341] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left menu, go to'
				[342] strong ''
					StaticText 'Merge requests'
				StaticText ', and select'
				[343] strong ''
					StaticText 'New merge request'
				StaticText '.'
			[344] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'In the'
				[345] strong ''
					StaticText 'Source branch'
				StaticText 'dropdown list box, select the branch in your forked repository as the source branch.'
			[346] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'In the'
				[347] strong ''
					StaticText 'Target branch'
				StaticText 'dropdown list box, select the branch from the upstream repository as the target branch. You can set a'
				[348] link 'default target project', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/merge_requests/creating_merge_requests.md#set-the-default-target-project'
				StaticText 'to change the default target branch (which can be useful if you are working in a forked project).'
			[349] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select'
				[350] strong ''
					StaticText 'Compare branches and continue'
				StaticText '.'
			[351] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select'
				[352] strong ''
					StaticText 'Create merge request'
				StaticText '.'
		[353] paragraph ''
			StaticText "After your work is merged, if you don't intend to make any other contributions to the upstream project, you can unlink your fork from its upstream project. Go to"
			[354] strong ''
				StaticText 'Settings > Advanced Settings'
			StaticText 'and'
			[355] link 'remove the forking relationship', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/settings/index.md#remove-a-fork-relationship'
			StaticText '.'
		[356] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'For more information,'
			[357] link 'see the forking workflow documentation', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/repository/forking_workflow.md'
			StaticText '.'
		[358] heading 'By sending an email'
		[360] paragraph ''
			StaticText "You can create a merge request by sending an email message to GitLab. The merge request target branch is the project's default branch."
		[361] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Prerequisites:'
		[362] list ''
			[363] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'A GitLab administrator must configure'
				[364] link 'incoming email', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/administration/incoming_email.md'
				StaticText '.'
			[365] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'A GitLab administrator must configure'
				[366] link 'Reply by email', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/administration/reply_by_email.md'
				StaticText '.'
		[367] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To create a merge request by sending an email:'
		[368] list ''
			[369] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[370] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
					[371] strong ''
						StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
					StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[372] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[373] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'On the left menu, select'
					[374] strong ''
						StaticText 'Merge requests'
					StaticText '.'
			[375] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[376] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'In the top right, select'
					[377] strong ''
						StaticText 'Email a new merge request to this project'
					StaticText '. An email address is displayed. Copy this address. Ensure you keep this address private.'
			[378] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[379] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Open an email and compose a message with the following information:'
				[380] list ''
					[381] listitem ''
						ListMarker '◦'
						StaticText 'The'
						[382] strong ''
							StaticText 'To'
						StaticText 'line is the email address you copied.'
					[383] listitem ''
						ListMarker '◦'
						StaticText 'The subject line is the source branch name.'
					[384] listitem ''
						ListMarker '◦'
						StaticText 'The message body is the merge request description.'
			[385] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				[386] paragraph ''
					StaticText 'Send the email message.'
		[387] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'A merge request is created.'
		[388] heading 'Add attachments when creating a merge request by email'
		[390] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'You can add commits to a merge request by adding patches as attachments to the email. All attachments with a filename ending in'
			[391] code ''
				StaticText '.patch'
			StaticText 'are considered patches and are processed ordered by name.'
		[392] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'The combined size of the patches can be 2 MB.'
		[393] paragraph ''
			StaticText "If the source branch from the subject does not exist, it is created from the repository's HEAD or the specified target branch. You can specify the target branch by using the"
			[394] link '/target_branch quick action', url='http://127.0.0.1:8023/help/user/project/quick_actions.md'
				[395] code ''
					StaticText '/target_branch'
			StaticText '. If the source branch already exists, the patches are applied on top of it.'
		[396] heading 'Set the default target project'
		[398] blockquote ''
			[399] paragraph ''
				[400] link 'Introduced', url='https://gitlab.com/gitlab-org/gitlab/-/merge_requests/58093'
				StaticText 'in GitLab 13.11.'
		[401] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'Merge requests have a source and a target project that are the same, unless forking is involved. Creating a fork of the project can cause either of these scenarios when you create a new merge request:'
		[402] list ''
			[403] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'You target an upstream project (the project you forked, and the default option).'
			[404] listitem ''
				ListMarker '•'
				StaticText 'You target your own fork.'
		[405] paragraph ''
			StaticText 'To have merge requests from a fork by default target your own fork (instead of the upstream project), you can change the default.'
		[406] list ''
			[407] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the top bar, select'
				[408] strong ''
					StaticText 'Main menu > Projects'
				StaticText 'and find your project.'
			[409] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'On the left menu, select'
				[410] strong ''
					StaticText 'Settings > General > Merge requests'
				StaticText '.'
			[411] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'In the'
				[412] strong ''
					StaticText 'Target project'
				StaticText 'section, select the option you want to use for your default target project.'
			[413] listitem ''
				ListMarker '0.'
				StaticText 'Select'
				[414] strong ''
					StaticText 'Save changes'
				StaticText '.'
step_data.thought:
I've successfully navigated to the documentation page about creating merge requests. The current page is titled 'Creating merge requests · Merge requests · Project · User · Help · GitLab' and contains comprehensive information about different ways to create merge requests in GitLab. This page appears to be exactly what the user requested to review.

The page covers various methods for creating merge requests including:
1. From the merge request list
2. From an issue
3. When adding, editing, or uploading a file
4. When creating a branch
5. When using Git commands locally
6. When working in a fork
7. By sending an email
8. Setting the default target project

Since I've successfully found and loaded the documentation about creating merge requests as requested by the user, I should inform them that I've completed the task.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully accessed the documentation about creating merge requests. The page provides comprehensive information about all the different ways to create merge requests in GitLab, including: from the merge request list, from an issue, when adding/editing files, when creating a branch, using Git commands locally, when working in a fork, by sending an email, and how to set the default target project. The documentation includes step-by-step instructions for each method.')
